text:
Hello guys, I am very new in HubSpot and need help
I need to add editable (not rich text) tag into my template. How i should do that?
Can`t understand why <div> not appear in builder. Please help

text is is plain-text; type of string:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/default-modules#one-line-of-text>

you looking for rich-text:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/default-modules#rich-text>
